title: Just searching for some players who are keen to play?
body:
Just add me, I'd much rather talk via mic a lot easier then typing but I would like for someone that is more experienced as well.

I'm new to LoL but I'm a DotA player warcraft dota not dota 2 so I have a decent idea about the game and everything just need some people to play with I'm making my way up levels at the moment so I can jump into ranked.

Only really thing I have to get use to is all the champions and I think I'll be sweet if you want to have a game or two just add me thanks again guys.

I am rather enjoying this game as well, I got interested off the OPL and ever since then I've been like yeah I'll give it a go but now I've really just started getting into it.
Thanks guys.

replies.body: Yeah sure I'd be willing to play with you.
